parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets cell's right-aligned text. Does not replace [[lnbText|cell's text]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[lnbSetTextRight]] [idc, [row, column], text]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetTextRight]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], text]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc)

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetTextRight]] [1492, [1,0], "right text"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>ctrl [[lnbSetTextRight]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0, 3], "right text"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbTextRight]] [[lnbSetColorRight]] [[lnbColorRight]] [[lnbText]]
</value></part></template></root>
